CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 31, 1962, pg. A5 reads: "Sponsored Bridal Shower - Organized as Les Jeunes Filles (The Young Girls), this group from Anna B. Heldman Community Center held a bridal shower fro Charlotte Williams, last week, at the center. Seen enjoying the festivities are Christine Watkins, Jacqueline Wilcox, Darlene Willis, Patricia Means, Mrs. Gladys Coffee, group leader; Karen Mosley, Charlotte Williams, June P. Harris, Audrey Davis, Maxine Dorsey and Gloria Hall.  Extreme rear: Warren Walton, young adult group leader."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Les Jeunes Filles members, from left: Christine Watkins, Jacqueline Wilcox, Darlene Willis, Patricia Means, Gladys Coffee, Karen Mosley, Charlotte Williams, guest of honor; June P. Harris, Audrey Davis, Maxine Dorsey and Gloria Hall, with Warren Walton in background, gathered in Anna B. Heldman Community Center for bridal shower
